node.npctext: What a wonderful day! Today was probably the best Quidditch match in my life!
Well, it's sleepy time, I'm so exhausted... By the way, what day is today?
Oh no! I have to bring the professor Snape my Potions homework!
I totally forgot about it, I haven't done anything. Snape will kill me!
I still remember his words "Clearly, fame isn't everything... is it, Mr. Potter?"
My groupmates are sleeping, including Hermione. How do I do this task?
All of I need is to make a potion. I need to find ingredients and get into potion class.
But I need to watch out for Filch's Cat, she's on duty tonight.
If she catches me for three times, I'll have to return to the hall.
But I'm sure I can stop her with magic spell using my wand. But where is it?...
Also I need force to use magic spell.
I reckon I can do it!
